title: Mushishi, Vol. 7
description: SOUL EATER Ginko is sent on a fact-finding expedition to discover what the head of an ancient clan of mushishi is doing in an isolated, abandoned Japanese village. But the answer may be more than Ginko can the Ragged Road he is investigating leads to mushi that can leave a man worse than dead! Includes special extras after the story!
author: Yuki Urushibara
